Heiemon

(寺岡平右衛門) (Teraoka Heiemon)

Authority Control:
January 1985 Program; Kabuki tojo jinbutsu jiten (Tokyo: Hakusuisha, 2006)

Plays:

The League of the 47 Ronin (仮名手本忠臣蔵)
